Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2010 12:09PM flomelo wrote: Hi all, Been a long time since I was on this site. I am a Stage,1 1cm, low grade, 8 year survior. Elizabeth Edwards died yesterday and I am so sad for her. Everytime someone dies in the news, i start to worry again. I hate to say it, but I may never stop worrying. My realtionship at that time ended, and I have never had another one. Flo
